participant_1.name: Lara
participant_1.personality: adventurous and down-to-earth, loves nature and enjoys working outdoors.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i've three arabian horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. my main transportation is my motorbike.
